articles.content: Gujarat Titans skipper Hardik Pandya had an almost perfect day at the office as he displayed an all-round performance to help his side defeat Rajasthan Royals by 37 runs at Dr DY Patil Sports Academy… [+1358 chars]

articles.title: Former PCB Chairman Makes Huge Revelation From Pakistan's Tour Of India In 2012-13 - NDTV Sports
articles.description: In 2012, Pakistan had toured India to play three ODIs and two T20Is. Zaka Ashraf, who was the president of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) at that time, has made an interesting revelation regarding the tour.
articles.content: It's been nearly a decade since India and Pakistan last played a bilateral series against each other. In 2012, Pakistan had toured India to play three ODIs and two T20Is. While Pakistan won the ODI s… [+1193 chars]
